input_args.text: 'I know this will lead to more posts about his Clinton is awful, untrustworthy, etc., and I agree with many of those sentiments. But she was one senator out of 100 and there is also a House, so despite Trump (and in the last paragraph the author\'s) statements she could not pass any laws by herself. If fact, in one debate she also mentioned the term "veto", which he ignored. There is a word for a politician who thinks one person makes the rules. It is dictator.'
